replies.bodyText: ContextCompat.getSystemService() actually calls Context.getSystemService(Class) on Android Marshmallow and higher, and calls Context.getSystemService(String) on lower versions.

The documentation for WifiManager states:
"On releases before Build.VERSION_CODES.N, this object should only be obtained from an Context#getApplicationContext(), and not from any other derived context to avoid memory leaks within the calling process."
